Class DocumentVectorVIntArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.ffg.data.DocumentVectorVIntArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentVector, Writable

    public class DocumentVectorVIntArray
extends Object
implements DocumentVector
    Document vector representation: Flat array compressed using Variable-Length Integers.

    Nima Asadi
